note:
Hey there! I'm Ning, a fitness addict who loves to train every day just to maintain my sanity.
A perpetual reader and thinker, pondering life's philosophical questions without ever reaching any solid resolutions.
A tech geek obsessing over all the latest gadgets and apps, clueless about how they actually work.
And a movie buff who watches so many mediocre films that the mere glimpse of creativity will be getting my praise non-stop.
